title: Support comparison options to ignore case and punctuation
description: Add flags to the comparison tool to optionally ignore case differences and punctuation when calculating accuracy. This helps measure OCR quality for content extraction use cases where formatting is less important.

title: Support evaluation of multiple models
description: Extend the OCR comparison pipeline to support multiple OCR models beyond Mistral. Should allow running the same images through different providers (e.g., Google Cloud Vision, AWS Textract, Azure Document Intelligence, Tesseract) and comparing their accuracy against the source transcriptions.
